languages.text: Allies suffer −{uip|PerceptionBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7}% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from Navigator powers and gain +{uip|ChanceBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7} to {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against them.

traits.locale_text: Allies get <u>(Navigator's Perception)</u>% less damage from powers of Path of the Open Eye and gain +<u>2×(Navigator's PER bonus)</u> to resistance checks against this path Navigator powers.
